long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With FLYMARK you can easily share your favorite web links with a single click! This extension allows you to send any page you bookmark directly to a Telegram group or channel. No more copying and pasting links—simply bookmark the page, and it will be instantly sent to your chosen Telegram destination.

Features:

- Quickly share bookmarked pages to a specified Telegram group or channel.
- Simple setup: Connect your Telegram account and choose your target group/channel.
- Seamless integration into your browser’s bookmarking feature.
Save time and stay organized while sharing important links with your community.
- Perfect for sharing content with teams, friends, or any community in your Telegram channels!
